Package dslab.util

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • dslab.util.Config
  • public final class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads the configuration from a .properties file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Config​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an instance of Config which reads configuration data form .properties file with given name found in classpath.
